variants.requirements: 1 less energy than required for door
variants.notes: Move away from door and insert an energy just as sein leaves the door. Refill your energy and put the remaining energy into the door.

Position yourself under an enemy, then charge dash and press jump or glide to cancel it, ideally on the same frame. Can be mapped to a single input. Depending on your position relative to the enemy, velocity and direction will be different.
Jump up on the side of a blue wall and stomp while touching the wall to break it.
Double jump, touch a wall, hold away from the wall and double jump again after leaving the wall. Repeat.
Throw the grenade and jump off the platform before the grenade hits the lantern. You will sink without taking damage while the cutscene plays.
With precise swimming, you only need to take 4 damage.

Stand on the left platform and throw a grenade onto the platform. Pause on the frame when the grenade hits the platform. Wait for a few seconds, unpause, and immediately swim to the pickup. Can cause you to go through walls if your positions are off.
Wait for the fish to be in a good position, then meteor kick to dive down quickly. Warp out after collecting the pickup.
Wait for the fish to be in a good position, then meteor kick to dive down quickly.
Catch the wind in the middle of the spikes to the right, ride it all the way up and then glide over to the tree.
Climb the left side of the right tree with wall jump and double jump.

variants.requirements: double jump, glide, airdash, grenade, wind
variants.notes: Catch the wind in the middle of the spikes to the right, ride it all the way up and then glide over to the tree. Conserve height with airdash and double jump.

Stand on the left swing and throw a grenade onto the left end of the swing. Pause on the frame when the grenade hits the swing. Wait for a few seconds, unpause. Can cause you to go through walls if you pause too long.
Get the right swing swinging by running left and right. Then triple jump to the left wall.
Triple jump to the right side of the tree, refresh triple jump on the small overhang.
Get the right swing swinging by running left and right. Then dash ramp and double jump to the left wall.
Lure fronkey with sein, rocket jump and glide to the pickup.
Lure fronkey with sein, damage boost over spikes and rocket jump to the pickup.
Drop the first crusher, ride it up and jump from as close to the top as possible. Then ride the second crusher up to the energy cell.

Bash fronkey under the first and second mushroom platform, then lure it to the bottom and get out of its aggro range to force a shorthop. Bash it over the spikes and pass below it. Lure it all the way to the left and make sure it dodges the spikes. Then bash to the energy cell.

Bash fronkey under the first and second mushroom platform, then lure it to the bottom and get out of its aggro range to force a shorthop. Bash it over the spikes and pass below it. Lure it to the left and make sure it dodges the spikes. Then bash to the experience.
Jump to the microledge just below the keystone, then immediately jump from there.
Jump to a small wall on the right of the ability cell, then walljump and doublejump from there.
bash down to send projectile up, then bash again without jumping

title: spirit caverns ledge near energy door

variants.notes: Walk to the ledge, hold down and left, then jump.
A tiny patch of friendly spikes.
Jump onto the spikes while charging, then charge jump all the way to the door.
Charge jump to the friendly spikes on the left, then charge jump to the door.

title: left of grove teleporter hidden experience

variants.notes: Lure the bird from the left, aggro it with spirit flame once it's at the tree. Stomp on top of the bird to bounce and get your double jump back.
Jump to the tree and climb it with wall jumps, then break the plant with charge flame from below.
Stand a little away from the wall, crouch and backflip. Move to the right while jumping and you should land directly on the microledge after a few attempts.
Bring the frog over to the ledge then either bash the frog to the left or bait a projectile to the left, jump after them and bash to the top left. Bash glide and double jump to misty.
push frog, rjump to get a high shot, redirect it with cdash
Wall charge jump from the wall above the pickup, aim bottom left. Dash to the right immediately after charge jumping.
Clear enemies to the left, push frog to the left, bait a projectile far to the left, cdash redirect the projectile.
Climb the left wall, jump over to the hanging log. Jump towards the right end of the branch and wall jump off the tip of the branch.
Lure out the sitshootshark, dash to the right and quickly rocket jump before the sitshootshark retreats again.
cflame redirect spider shot to top left, then cdash redirect to ks door
clear enemies, wait for drop slime to respawn, then updash to drop slime and stomp on it
wrap around the right wall with precise jumps
move the rock with stomp, then jump to the left of the slime and bounce off of it with stomp
throw grenade, then jump to right to load the plant
Hug the wall, turn around while crouching, then start running right and jump soon after. Then aggro the baneling and jump over it to make it break the floor.
Bash one projectile to the left, bash to it and use that to aggro the left elemental, bash off right elemental projectile again, then off left elemental projectile.
carry baneling to the left with cdashes, rjump and then cdash after baneling dies
Use projectiles from bottom elemental to aggro the top elemental, then bash up.
lure fronkey to the left, then use right wall to gain height, then stomp bounce and stomp stall to gain more height
Use projectiles from bottom elemental to aggro the top elemental, then bash up and right.
Lure fronkey to the left pillar, bash it over the lava, then bash off fronkey.
Attack baneling about 20 times before aggroing it. It will launch itself into the wall and break it.
launch baneling over horu fields with cdashes and follow after it
launch baneling over ledge with cdash, chase after it with cdash and immediately rjump
there is a piece of rectangular collision that disappears when you get close
lure bird down, take damage from bird as you stomp and use iframes from that to jump off spikes
throw grenade, then jump after it and bash off of it

variants.requirements: broken roof to HC, sein, djump, stomp
variants.notes: look up and jump to lure bird down, then lure it to the side to get a good angle, then stomp bounce off bird
push frog, stomp from further away, let it break wall and roof for you
push frog to the right, jump over and rjump, glide for a moment at the very top
juggle frog with dbashes and airdash to cross the pit

variants.requirements: broken spider sac wall, sein, bash
variants.notes: lure swarm enemy, split when it stops moving, then drop down with it and bash off of it
throw a grenade, then jump after it and bash off of it

variants.requirements: wjump, cflame, glide, soul link, 1 damage
variants.notes: respawn, redirect slime projectile, use that to gain iframes and cross the spike pit
jump and airdash to reach pillar
stomp igor, airdash to wall
lure fronkey down, move left, jump and take the damage, stomp bounce on fronkey
dash through the mushroom as it appears, grab the mushroom from the right, updash and glide to KS
follow the entire sequence of appearing mushrooms, refresh airdash by touching and leaving a wall
throw grenade, then jump after it and bash off of it
double bash frog to the right of the spike pit, then double bash its projectile
stand on the corner of the rock to get a dash ramp and combine it with a dash glide
beat the rhino
throw 3 grenades and bash off of them
push the baneling off the ledge with cflame
bash and push the frog as close to the spikes as possible, then trigger a shot from where the tight shaft begins and redirect it with bash. Gliding too high will despawn the frog.
dashglide to the peg

title: above death gauntlet from spider lake

variants.notes: lure fronkey, tank a hit and bounce with stomp
save rather far away, redirect slime projectile with stomp and get hit by it next to the door
lure baneling, hide below ledge and throw grenade as it passes over you

variants.requirements: climb, charge jump, air dash, 8 damage
variants.notes: Kill the bottom elemental with a climb charge jump and airdash. Land on the dark friendly spikes below the elemental. Charge jump to the top right twice, taking damage once each, then charge jump and airdash to the map pedestal.
stay calm and bash things

variants.requirements: climb, charge jump, 2 charge dash, 8 damage
variants.notes: Kill the top elemental by making the bottom elemental shoot at it. Jump off the ledge to the right to bait a shot of the bottom elemental and gain some time. Airdash to the small wall to the left and climb charge jump as high as possible. Charge dash into the spikes to the right, then immediately start charging and land on the spikes. Charge jump while still having iframes. Charge dash to the left, where you will take damage again, and climb up.

variants.requirements: wjump or climb, stomp, 2 damage, access to gladeser or valley fronkey
variants.notes: lure a high health fronkey from gladeser or valley entry to first HC, tank damage and stomp bounce off of fronkey
time your drop precisely and run
push frog over, redirect projectile with stomp
push frog over, redirect projectile with grenade
push frog over, bounce with stomp
precise climb ramp
cjump/climb to the door from the back
Save at the lever, then rekindle the save while pulling the lever. Then die or reload the save file. The lever will remain permanently pulled and the door will stay open.
get fronkey over spikes, then cross cushers, fronkey will follow just fine on its own. Then just barely enter aggro range and leave it immediately to force shorthops by fronkey
fronkey to the right of bounce pad, jump late off bounce pad, make fronkey land on it, jump straight from bounce pad on top of the peg
ramp into dash glide, climb the wall, then updash or airdash
no known applications
